sql.remarks: 根据订单号获取订单详情

mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM `bull_order` WHERE order_no = @{order_no: String} LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM `bull_order` WHERE user_id = @{user_id: long} AND p_id = @{p_id: long} ORDER BY `order_id` DESC LIMIT 1;

UPDATE `bull_order` SET `status` = @{status:int}, `basic_date` = @{basic_date:int}, `basic_fulltime` = @{basic_fulltime:Date}, `update_date` = @{update_date:int}, `update_fulltime` = @{update_fulltime:Date} WHERE `user_id` = @{user_id:long} AND `p_id` = @{p_id:long} ORDER BY `order_id` DESC LIMIT 1;

UPDATE `bull_order` SET `status` = @{status:int}, `out_no` = @{out_no: String}, `submit_date` = @{submit_date:int}, `submit_fulltime` = @{submit_fulltime:Date}, `update_date` = @{update_date:int}, `update_fulltime` = @{update_fulltime:Date} WHERE `user_id` = @{user_id:long} AND `p_id` = @{p_id:long} ORDER BY `order_id` DESC LIMIT 1;
